rows.label: qst200912_msg001
rows.name: Thanks for calling Otto-san for me!

rows.label: qst200912_msg002
rows.name:
Thanks to that, the windmill is
fixed and we can grind flour again.

rows.label: qst200912_msg003
rows.name:
We'll reopen tomorrow... I'd like to
say, but there's still a problem.

rows.label: qst200912_msg004
rows.name:
The shop is repaired, but we don't
have the ingredients to make bread.

rows.label: qst200912_msg005
rows.name:
Thanks to the Armu,
everything was ruined.

rows.label: qst200912_msg007
rows.name:
A merchant named Kupon should be
delivering the ingredients...

rows.label: qst200912_msg008
rows.name:
But he's wandering around
somewhere and hasn't arrived
at the promised time.

rows.label: qst200912_msg009
rows.name:
Could he have had an
accident on the way...?

rows.label: qst200912_msg013
rows.name:
The area around Hushview Bridge
is dangerous lately... Be very
careful when you go.

rows.label: qst200912_msg014
rows.name:
You saw Kupon-san near
Hushview Bridge, right? I
hope he's still nearby...
